table.caption: Topaz Dragon Wyrmling Connections
rows: Moved by pity, a {@creature giant eagle} continues bringing food to an abandoned {@creature topaz dragon wyrmling|FTD}, despite the wyrmling's attempts to eat the eagle.
A {@creature pseudodragon} who is fanatical about the kinship of all dragonkind is trying to win a {@creature Topaz Dragon Wyrmling|FTD|topaz dragon wyrmling's} friendship.

A {@creature topaz dragon wyrmling|FTD} has developed a taste for crab meat and persistently hunts a {@creature giant crab} that always manages to evade the wyrmling. (The crab might have been the recipient of a druid's {@spell awaken} spell.)
A mated pair of {@creature Griffon||griffons} found a topaz dragon egg, and they care for it as if it were their own.
A {@creature sea hag} is on the hunt for a {@creature topaz dragon wyrmling|FTD}, to be used as a component in a fell ritual.
A pirate crew keeps a curmudgeonly {@creature topaz dragon wyrmling|FTD} as a beloved mascot.
table.name: Connected Creatures; Topaz Dragon Wyrmling Connections
